text_section.headline: Illuminate Your Home This Diwali
text_section.subtext: Bring home prosperity and style with our exquisite Diwali collection.

offer_tag.style: Diya (oil lamp) shaped badge with glow

prompt_settings.optional: Add subtle sparkle overlay, traditional rangoli patterns in corners.

prompt_settings.background_colors: Warm orange fading to a cheerful yellow

text_section.headline: Sparkle Up Your Space This Diwali!
text_section.subtext: Discover dazzling furniture to make your celebrations brighter.

offer_tag.style: Explosion/burst shape, yellow with red text

call_to_action.style: Rounded button, dark teal with yellow text

prompt_settings.optional: Subtle diya icons floating, small glitter particles.

prompt_settings.border_design: Coin patterns and floral motifs in gold
prompt_settings.background_style: Deep, rich solid color with subtle pattern
prompt_settings.background_colors: Emerald green or royal blue with gold accents

text_section.headline: Welcome Prosperity This Diwali
text_section.subtext: Adorn your home with furniture that brings both comfort and good fortune.

call_to_action.style: Rectangular button, emerald green with gold border

prompt_settings.optional: Subtle Lakshmi foot imprints, scattered gold coins graphic.

text_section.headline: Give the Gift of Comfort & Style This Diwali
text_section.subtext: Find the perfect present for your loved ones from our curated Diwali collection.

call_to_action.style: Rounded button, soft gold with brown text

prompt_settings.optional: Add subtle glitter or shimmer effect, soft shadows under gift boxes.

prompt_settings.border_design: Soft, diffused light glow around the edges
prompt_settings.background_style: Blurred warm interior lighting with festive elements
prompt_settings.background_colors: Cozy oranges, deep reds, and amber tones

text_section.headline: Create Memorable Diwali Moments

prompt_settings.optional: Subtle traditional rangoli on the floor, small diyas on surfaces within the graphic.

prompt_settings.background_style: Minimalist background with abstract light patterns
prompt_settings.background_colors: Cool greys and blacks with sharp gold and silver accents

text_section.headline: Adorn Your Home with Divine Blessings
text_section.subtext: Furniture that brings peace, prosperity, and a touch of the divine to your Diwali abode.

prompt_settings.background_colors: Dark blues and purples with bright orange and yellow streaks

text_section.headline: Diwali is Almost Here! Get Ready!
text_section.subtext: Don't miss out on our pre-Diwali specials to prepare your home for the festivities!

prompt_settings.optional: Countdown timer element, subtle firework animation in the background.

text_section.headline: Celebrate a Greener Diwali with Comfort
text_section.subtext: Choose sustainable furniture that brightens your home and helps the planet this festive season.

call_to_action.style: Rounded button, light green with dark green text

prompt_settings.optional: Subtle use of recycled material textures, soft glow from LED diyas.
